entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Bonaventure
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:50 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
